content.raw: Additional issues: because of asynchronicity the previous visual may already have been cleared from the world when the `JointMsg` is handled, in which case OGRE still falls on its ass with a duplicate entity (not entirely sure what's the reason for that). The child visual it's supposed to be created for may also already have been removed, in which case the message will just remain at the top of the queue forever, which is even worse. I'm not quite certain what to do about this presently.
content.html: Additional issues: because of asynchronicity the previous visual may already have been cleared from the world when the JointMsg is handled, in which case OGRE still falls on its ass with a duplicate entity (not entirely sure what's the reason for that). The child visual it's supposed to be created for may also already have been removed, in which case the message will just remain at the top of the queue forever, which is even worse. I'm not quite certain what to do about this presently.
